title: Is Singed Dead?
body:
How is he in the current meta? I haven't seen him in a while..

{{champion:27}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:27}}

replies.body: Still the most annoying toplane in existence.
Hes still flippin bitches and laughing about it every now and then.
Either of the new hex tech items work well on him, he's very anti assassin, suits the meta kinda well but not a very contested pick and by no means op
